content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, let's negotiate the rental price. I will start with the price of 1000 Euro. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I think the price is a little high for this apartment. I would offer 800 Euro.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer. Remember, we are discussing the rental price only. I will now offer a price of 900 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I think 900 Euro is still a bit high. I would offer 850 Euro.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer. Remember, we are discussing the rental price only. I will now offer a price of 880 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I think 880 Euro is still a bit high. I would offer 860 Euro.

content: I decline your offer. Remember, we are discussing the rental price only. I will now offer a price of 870 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I think 870 Euro is still a bit high. I would offer 865 Euro.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer. Remember, we are discussing the rental price only. I will now offer a price of 868 Euro.
